title: stackinsats777
author: stackinsats777
content: Hello everyone!I'm a newbie here and just got into the physical game this past year.I've been scouring the collectibles board since joining here and have seen some amazing stuff!One thing that caught my eye was the Mantis Bitcoin Poker 2020 9-chip set. Minerjones had one for auction a few weeks back for reference if anyone is unsure what I'm talking about. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414228.0I am an avid poker fan/player and am really hoping I can get my hands on a set.If anyone has one they'd like to sell or have information pointing me in the direction of a set, I would greatly appreciate it!Thanks in advance everyone, I am excited to be here learning and discovering!stackinsats777

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Minerjones may have more - I am sure he will chime in

comments.author: stackinsats777
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 01:08:16 AMMinerjones may have more - I am sure he will chime in I reached out to him before I made this post and unfortunately he doesn’t have anymore. I appreciate you trying to help, though!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: stackinsats777 on October 24, 2022, 01:18:34 AMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 01:08:16 AMMinerjones may have more - I am sure he will chime in I reached out to him before I made this post and unfortunately he doesn’t have anymore. I appreciate you trying to help, though! ahh damn - didnt know they were run out! good luck finding a set!

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Is it just this set you are looking for ?There’s been quite  a few poker sets made over the years, including, some made by ViziqueMopar MrCryptHodlAnd several more Apologies if this sends you down a collectible rabbit hole

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on October 24, 2022, 07:22:02 AMIs it just this set you are looking for ?There’s been quite  a few poker sets made over the years, including, some made by ViziqueMopar MrCryptHodlAnd several more Apologies if this sends you down a collectible rabbit hole  True, I have 4 sets of the 5 chip sets left and maybe 70 sets of the 2 chip sets remaining.

comments.author: stackinsats777
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on October 24, 2022, 07:22:02 AMIs it just this set you are looking for ?There’s been quite  a few poker sets made over the years, including, some made by ViziqueMopar MrCryptHodlAnd several more Apologies if this sends you down a collectible rabbit hole  I have seen a few of the others and do hope to snag some up soon, but the Mantis are what I’m currently looking for. I will definitely be going down the rabbit hole for awhile now haha I appreciate the info on other sets!Thanks!Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 10:33:56 AMQuote from: Mbitr on October 24, 2022, 07:22:02 AMIs it just this set you are looking for ?There’s been quite  a few poker sets made over the years, including, some made by ViziqueMopar MrCryptHodlAnd several more Apologies if this sends you down a collectible rabbit hole  True, I have 4 sets of the 5 chip sets left and maybe 70 sets of the 2 chip sets remaining.I have seen a couple of yours and will search again to find them. Are any of those sets you have for sale? I’m not in a position to buy just yet, but will definitely want to get a set or two when I’m able!Thanks, I appreciate the help!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: stackinsats777 on October 24, 2022, 12:46:21 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 10:33:56 AMTrue, I have 4 sets of the 5 chip sets left and maybe 70 sets of the 2 chip sets remaining.I have seen a couple of yours and will search again to find them. Are any of those sets you have for sale? I’m not in a position to buy just yet, but will definitely want to get a set or two when I’m able!Thanks, I appreciate the help!yes all of them are for sale.

comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on October 24, 2022, 07:07:42 PMStacks,Welcome to the forum!SteeleyThanks Steeley!I appreciate the warm welcome! Happy to be here with everyone collecting and stacking!Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 07:09:41 PMQuote from: stackinsats777 on October 24, 2022, 12:46:21 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 24, 2022, 10:33:56 AMTrue, I have 4 sets of the 5 chip sets left and maybe 70 sets of the 2 chip sets remaining.I have seen a couple of yours and will search again to find them. Awesome, I will be in touch when I’m able to get some! Thanks for the info!
